scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run dev-server" "office-addin-debugging start manifest.xml"
scripts.dev-server: ts-node scripts/verify-certs.ts && http-server dist -S -C cert.pem -K key.pem --cors . -p 3000
scripts.watch: concurrently "tsc -w" "nodemon --watch src/index.html --watch src/styles.css --exec \"cp src/index.html src/styles.css dist/\""
